name: Pagea's drop TWO letters # 1 Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's your clue for the first 10 letter word:

To comprehend something.

Now drop two letters to get an 8 letter word:

A description of someone who is stuck at sea.

Now a 6 letter word:

To have caught an animal in a trap.

Now a 4 letter word:

The MLB team from Cincinnati.

Finally a 2 letter word:

Shorthand for regarding.

Repeat the process with this NEW 10 letter word:

One of the constituent parts of a meal.
To set something on fire again.
From Monty Python, "We are the knights who say ___"?
